body: For context, since it wasn't clear to me, and I had to ask: "rs" means "rubber stamp", and it is a light review. To quote @gijsk: "I'm expecting that you know how to produce a backout for a given revision (or at least, github does)"

body_html: For context, since it wasn't clear to me, and I had to ask: "rs" means "rubber stamp", and it is a light review. To quote @gijsk: "I'm expecting that you know how to produce a backout for a given revision (or at least, github does)"
